announcement.name: Majestic Himalayan Retreat
announcement.summary: Destination: Manali, Leh, and Ladakh, India Duration: 7 Days / 6 Nights Highlights: Explore the scenic landscapes of the Himalayas. Visit monasteries and experience Tibetan culture. Jeep safari to Pangong Lake. Camp under the stars in Nubra Valley. Cost: ₹45,000 per person Package Includes: Accommodation, meals, guided tours, and transportation.
announcement.title: Majestic Himalayan Retreat
